document.full_text: egypt will open its border with the gaza strip "on a daily basis" starting from may 28, the state mena news agency said wednesday, to ease entry restrictions for palestinians.
document.title: egypt to open gaza border crossing from may 28
lines_and_colors: egypt will open its border with the gaza strip "on a daily basis" starting from may 28, the state mena news agency said wednesday, to ease entry restrictions for palestinians.
